title: The Crimes of Stephen Hawke 1936 (Thriller, Crime Film) Tod Slaughter, Marjorie Taylor

sources.title: The Crimes of Stephen Hawke 1936 (Thriller, Crime Film) Tod Slaughter, Marjorie Taylor
sources.description:
A crazed killer known as "The Spinebreaker" is terrorizing London with a series of grisly murders. The police seem powerless to stop him. When the police come to suspect Stephen Hawke, he leaves London, but has to return to save his daughter from a cruel police chief!

Suspicions and dangers mount, Stephen Hawke must navigate a web of deceit and danger to protect his daughter and confront a menacing police chief in a thrilling race against time in London.

Original title: The Crimes of Stephen Hawke (1936)
This film is available with subtitles in many languages.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/whH6ZWa0Dws


Director and Producer: George King
Writers: Jack Celestin, Frederick Hayward, H.F. Maltby
Starring: Tod Slaughter, Eric Portman, Marjorie Taylor, D.J. Williams
Genre: Crime, Melodrama, Thriller


@CultCinemaClassics
